articles.title: What to know about the Nipah virus - CNN
articles.description: The World Health Organization reported two cases of a rare virus in an eastern Indian state on Thursday.
articles.content:
The World Health Organization reported two cases of a rare virus in an eastern Indian state on Thursday.
The virus called Nipah kills more than half of the people it infects. Nipah virus, which was … [+3440 chars]

articles.title: What the ‘mother of all deals’ between India and the EU means for global trade - The Conversation
